def priority(item: float, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """Returns priority with which we want to add item to each bin.

    Args:
        item: Size of item to be added to the bin.
        bins: Array of capacities for each bin.

    Return:
        Array of same size as bins with priority score of each bin.
    """
    """Improved version of `priority_v1`."""
    priorities = np.zeros_like(bins)  # Initialize priorities array
    
    total_capacity = np.sum(bins)
    min_bin_capacity = np.min(bins)
    max_bin_capacity = np.max(bins)
    
    for i in range(len(bins)):
        if item <= bins[i]:
            if bins[i] == max_bin_capacity:
                priorities[i] = 1.0
            else:
                priority_increase = (bins[i] - item) / bins[i]
                priority_decrease = (max_bin_capacity - min_bin_capacity) / (max_bin_capacity - min_bin_capacity)
                priorities[i] = 1.0 - priority_increase + priority_decrease
        else:
            priority_increase = (item - bins[i]) / item
            priority_decrease = (bins[i] - min_bin_capacity) / (max_bin_capacity - min_bin_capacity)
            priorities[i] = max(0, 1.0 - priority_increase - priority_decrease)
    
    return priorities
